ğŸ¥ NHS CRISIS NEEDS URGENT ACTION ğŸ¥

Waiting lists are at record highs. Staff are burning out. Patients are suffering. The Liberal Democrats have a plan to save our NHS:

ğŸŒ± COMMUNITY ENERGY IS THE FUTURE ğŸŒ±

ğŸ—³ï¸ DEMOCRACY FOR THE 21ST CENTURY ğŸ—³ï¸

Our democratic institutions were designed centuries ago. It's time for an update! The Unity Movement's constitutional reforms will:

âœ… Introduce proportional representation

Every vote should count. Every voice should be heard. Government should serve the people, not vested interests.
